abstract: New York Red Bulls midfielder Dax McCarty will replace injured New York City FC midfielder Frank Lampard in Major League Soccer All-Star Game; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: M.L.S. Commissioner Don Garber chose midfielder Dax McCarty as the All-Star Game replacement for the injured New York City F.C. midfielder Frank Lampard.

headline.main: Red Bull Is Named an All-Star

snippet: M.L.S. Commissioner Don Garber chose midfielder Dax McCarty as the All-Star Game replacement for the injured New York City F.C. midfielder Frank Lampard.

keywords.value: New York City Football Club (Soccer Team)
